file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-02-06 - MAIN-LANDING-GEAR SHOCK ABSORBER - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-LANDING-GEAR SHOCK ABSORBER - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do an inspection on the Main Landing Gear (MLG) shock absorber for general condition. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 32-10-02-200-801-A ♦ MLG SHOCK ABSORBER - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-10-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-02-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MLG SHOCK ABSORBER - INSPECTION A. General (1) Use this procedure to do an inspection on the MLG shock absorber for general condition. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Gage (Range: 3000 psi) To measure strut pressure available Commercially Metal Ruler To measure height H available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task LH and RH MLG I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the landing gear safety pins are installed on the MLGs ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). (2) Connect the pressure gage to the filling/charging valve. J. Visually Check MLG Shock Absorber Extension (Figure 601) (Figure 602) SUBTASK 211-002-A (1) Do an inspection on the MLG shock absorber (1) for general condition and leakage (Figure 601). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 32-10-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Do the check of the H height. Refer to the instructions in Figure 602. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the pressure gage from the filling/charging valve. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 32-10-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
